answers.answer: The dopomoha.ro flyer contains general information from DOPOMOHA.RO.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: People can print the dopomoha.ro poster and display it in crowded places visible to people, such as storefronts or apartment buildings.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: People can share dopomoha.ro content wherever they go, including in stores, means of transport, or parks.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The phrase book offers common expressions translated into English and Ukrainian from Romanian.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'phrase book'.

answers.answer: One can access the common expressions guide by clicking the link for the phrase book.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'phrase book'.

answers.answer: Sprijin de Urgență can provide resources, food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, or volunteers.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: One can request resources from Sprijin de Urgență by using the 'Request or provide resources' option.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: The provided content does not specify the types of volunteers Sprijin de Urgență needs, only that volunteers are a resource that can be offered or requested.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: Un Acoperiș offers support in finding temporary accommodation for vulnerable people who are coming to Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.

answers.answer: One can access the Un Acoperiș program by choosing the 'Access Un Acoperiș!' option.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.

answers.answer: People can offer accommodation through Un Acoperiș to help vulnerable people who are now coming to Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.
